keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By MICHAEL WAHID HANNA and DANIEL BENAIM

lead_paragraph: The Republican nominee’s claim that President Obama is the ‘founder of ISIS’ is being welcomed by the United States’ enemies.

headline.main: How Do Trump’s Conspiracy Theories Go Over in the Middle East? Dangerously.

snippet: The Republican nominee’s claim that President Obama is the ‘founder of ISIS’ is being welcomed by the United States’ enemies....
abstract: Op-Ed article by foreign policy experts Michael Wahid Hanna and Daniel Benaim underscores danger Donald Trump's comments about Pres Obama being founder of Islamic State group will have for American interests abroad; notes similarity between statement and conspiracy theories in Middle Eastern news media about United States and Islamic State, and way similar conspiracy theories have been promoted to encourage anti-American sentiment.
